long_description: Large and in charge of carrying stuff, the DAKINE Wheeled Duffle bag makes easy work of keeping all your gear consolidated as you travel about. U-shaped zipper allows centralized, easy access into the cavernous main compartment. 2 exterior zippered pockets on the ends of the duffle make it easy to access small accessories or on-the-go essentials. Retractable handle extends and closes smoothly; schlepping is made easier thanks to a top handle and center haul handles. Heavy-duty urethane wheels allow easy maneuvering through airports and parking lots; wheels are replaceable in case of a mishap on the road (replacement wheels not included). Large DAKINE Wheeled Duffle bag is PVC free and made from nylon and 600-denier polyester for durable, lightweight protection of your gear.
short_description: Large and in charge of carrying stuff, the DAKINE Wheeled Duffle bag makes easy work of keeping all your gear consolidated as you travel about.
